alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Chemung and central Tioga Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spencer, or 13 miles northwest of Owego, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Owego, Berkshire, Newark Valley, Candor, Spencer, Van Etten, Apalachin, Tioga Terrace, Willseyville and Campville. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 64 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
